PBLOC.name: Prison Block
PBLOC.desc: You stand in the center of the ship's detention center

CELL.name: Open Cell
CELL.desc: Your old cell seems roomier than before

items.desc: Your old badge is lying on the ground

PCAFE.name: Prison Cafeteria
PCAFE.desc: You reach the prison cafeteria. You can still taste lunch from today. You gag

items.desc: Must be your lucky day! You see a quarter in the toilet

KITCHEN.name: Kitchen
KITCHEN.desc: You enter the kitchen. It smells half-good in here

CAFE.name: Cafeteria
CAFE.desc: You reach the cafeteria. This is where the non-criminals eat

items.desc: A cup of coffee is sitting on a far off table
items.take: You take the cup. The name on the cup says Gus

LOUNGE.name: Lounge
LOUNGE.desc: You enter the lounge. There's a reception desk and a couple couches. Through the doorway you can see some offices

items.desc: You see a vending machine, which seems to be broken, dispensing fortune cookies

items.take: The machine must have been broken, it gives you the cookie for free

OFFICE.name: Offices
OFFICE.desc: You enter the office. It looks like any other American office

items.desc: You can see the hanger door, the way out, but it seems like there's no way to open it
You try to open the door, but it won't budge
You see a desk with the nametag Gus

INTEL.name: Intelligence Office
INTEL.desc: There are computers all around you with programs open that make no sense to you. In the middle of the North wall there is a giant monitor that has the number sequence 0225 on it

STAIR.name: Control Room
STAIR.desc: Within the intelligence bay, you walk up the stairs to the control room. There you see many keyboards and number pads, you notice that on the main monitor there is a location to type in a password to unlock the hanger door. You remember the numbers from the previous exit, 0225, and type it in. You hear a rumble throughout the facility

STAIR2.name: Control Room
STAIR2.desc: Within the intelligence bay, you walk up the stairs to the control room. There you see many keyboards and number pads

INTEL2.name: Intelligence Offices
INTEL2.desc: You walk down the stairs. There are computers all around you with programs open that make no sense to you. The center monitor reads open

OFFICE2.name: Offices
OFFICE2.desc: The first thing you notice as you enter is that the hanger door is wide open now. You then notice that all other exits are sealed

HANGER.name: Hanger
HANGER.desc: You can see one ship left in the hanger. You then realise that you see foreign spacecraft outside the facility through the windows

SHIP.name: Ship
SHIP.desc: You enter the ship. The keys are right in the glove compartment (how convenient). As you clumsily fly out of the hanger and reach Earth. You learn that aliens have declared war on the human race. To the human's surprise the aliens were defeated before they even entered our atmosphere. The aliens were defeated by one ship flying back from the deserted spacestation in sector 5. Lucky for you, These aliens were not equipt to take over another inteligent race, but to your credit you were still pretty cool. After you returned to Earth everyone celebrated your bravery, you even got to meet The Govenor of Rhode Island, your home state. He gave you a ribbon and made sure that your full prison sentence was to be eliminated, even though there was only a few weeks left. In the end, you got you job at the post office back and retired at 65.
